ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Sahyog Social and Welfare Society is a Non-Governmental Organization (NGO) registered under the Society Registration Act 21, 1860. It was formed with the aim and objective to work on all round issues of social development and progress of the marginalized and weaker sections of the society through planned interventions. Sahyog Social and Welfare Society with the support of a dedicated team of academicians, professionals and social activists has successfully undertaken a range of activities like providing life skills trainings, vocational trainings, empowering women through various leadership and skill development programmes, providing remedial classes to aspiring youths besides supporting programmes cover basic public health, legal issues, environmental issues, art & culture issues, minority issues etc.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: At present, our organization is working in the field of education and health. Under literacy programme, some literacy centres are established at those places where government or private schools are not available. These centers are run one hour daily till three months with a group of 30-30 children, ladies and gents separately. The literacy materials are given free by the organization to these centers. A small amount is paid as a remuneration to the literacy staff and teachers from organization level. A certificate is issued from organization to the literate person after the end of programme. In this programme we achieve a great success. Literate children are attracted to school for primary education and labours (ladies and gents) are benefited under this programme to receive their proper remuneration particularly the government of India MNREGA scheme. How ever, we organize meetings, seminars and other activities day to day for the success of these schemes. In the field of health, our organization start health camps fortnightly in those back-ward areas where government health centres are not available. On these camps free health check up is done by doctors to the needy and poor people. Simple and first aid medicines are given free in these camps by the organization. A small amount is paid to the doctors and health staffs as for check up fees from organization. An idea for precaution is given in these camps specially to diarhea and malaria based diseases. Meetings and seminars are organized regularly for health awareness. In future our organization is going to work on the scheme of drinking water purification. Under this programme we will test drinking water area-wise and detect impurity on them. After that we will try to pure drinking water by the co-operation of doctors and specialist of this field.
